app.terms.title: Privacy and ConSex Terms
app.terms.text:
Welcome to ConSex! By using this app, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

Consent:
ConSex is designed to facilitate the process of obtaining consent through QR code scanning. Users must ensure they have explicit consent before scanning someone else's QR code.Users are solely responsible for obtaining consent before scanning a QR code and must respect the privacy and boundaries of others.

Privacy:
Consentrespects your privacy. We do not collect or store any personal data from QR code scans.Users are advised to use the app responsibly and refrain from sharing sensitive information via QR codes.

Responsible Use:
Users must use ConSex in accordance with local laws and regulations regarding privacy and consent.Any misuse of the app, including unauthorized scanning of QR codes or sharing of inappropriate content, is strictly prohibited.

Disclaimer:
ConSex is provided 'as is' without any warranty of any kind, express or implied. We shall not be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the app.By using Consent, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use the app.

Please note that these terms and conditions may be subject to change. It is your responsibility to review them periodically for updates.

Thank you for using ConSex responsibly and respecting the privacy and consent of others.
